column1: The next time I hear about this, I'm going to have to look and see what I can do to make it go away.
I have been very clear about what my position is about this, and I'm going to follow it up this time.
I want to make sure that I've done a good job of making this happen, and that I'm not trying to sell it to you.
This email was sent to: John Podesta <john.podesta@gmail.com>
I have not been able to find the details.
The only thing that is clear, is that you have not been very forthcoming about how much you would like to see the proposal taken off the table.
I would like to think we're working on it.
I would also like to hope that you and your staff have been following up on your approach with this.
I'm not in a position to make it happen.
But I want to work with you and I want to see what you can do.
I'm going to wait and see what you do.
I'm going to look for some answers.
